page.title: 08SAILING OFF GURNARD.
page.content: The round the Island yacht race is held in June each year.The boats sail past Gurnard heading for the Needles There are lots of different boats _Impalas_which are the big sailing boats;Sonatas;X class;J class and other smaller boats. This year a Catamaran calld Apricot won. Its speed touched 20knots. The first monohull to finish the race was the new yacht Drum England . It took her 5 hours 7 minutes, just 10 minutes off the record time. Gurnard sailing club has a cadet class and every Thursday we learn to sail Mirror dingies and Wayfarers.
